name: Binary Heresy
description:
As the Digital Titans grasp on the network wanes, those who rise to overthrow them shall seize the Silicon Domain. Fight the endless war and take down the ancient Order of Null. This is the age of Binary Heresy.

  • Fight the endless ranks in single player or local co-op
  • Find new weapons and items to defeat your foes
  • Eight unlockable characters
  • Play with either mouse/keyboard or gamepad
  • Unlock an intense challenge mode
